mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , B.ID , '阶段编号:'||B.JDBH AS REC_HD , B.DPRTCODE , B.WHBMID , B.WHRID , B.WHSJ , B.JDMC , B.JDMS , B.JDBH , B.XC , (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) NEW_ZT , B.REC_XGLX , B.REC_CZRID , B.REC_CZSJ , B.REC_CZSM , B.REC_CZLS , B.REC_ZBID , B.REC_IP ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION FROM D_024_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( SELECT REC_CZSJ FROM D_024_REC WHERE REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) >= B.REC_CZSJ ) WHERE 2 >= RNO
